name: I'mBored
0:
”Alexa, I'm Bored”
”Alexa, ask I'm bored for an idea”
”Alexa, ask I'm bored for something to do”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i'm bored
des: Instead of the kids asking you what they can do when they're bored, they can ask Alexa! Alexa will return a random idea of something they can do to keep them entertained.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
